scripts.install: npm i --prefix ./projects/frontend-react && npm i --prefix ./projects/frontend-ng && npm i --prefix ./projects/frontend-vue
scripts.build: npm run build-front-ng && npm run build-front-react && npm run build-front-vue && npm run build-back
scripts.watch: npm run watch-front-ng & npm run build-back
scripts.ci: npm ci --prefix ./projects/frontend-ng && npm ci --prefix ./projects/frontend-react && npm ci --prefix ./projects/frontend-vue
